issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.summary: Invalid state transition exception caught when tearing down a (mini) cluster

comments.body:

{code}
[~steve_l] Which tests are you running when you got this exception ? Is this issue still valid ? If it is, could you share how we can re-produce this ?

very old test by the look of things; Hoya (precursor to Slider) testing a live HBase cluster. 

I couldn't replicate this with existing code & haven't seen since.

It happened during teardown, so I don't know how critical it is -if you can't debug it from this log, best to close as cannot-reproduce
